channel.title: Critical Role Safety Goodness
channel.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=g-mjkcjWaZ0&feature=youtu.be&fbclid=IwAR27enp0OzjsD0fgEFR6nZj8APaJavc-THk2sQdE9bQP1IaHJ_YnNFn4TEk Soda Wax putting in one place all the good work Critical role is doing regarding safety. To me it's reassuring to see them take a stand against some skeletons creeping in the geekdom cupboard. In case that's not what you're hearing, though, tell us more.

item.title: Critical Role Safety Goodness
item.dc:creator: @DeReel
item.description:
@DeReel wrote:


Soda Wax putting in one place all the good work Critical role is doing regarding safety. To me it’s reassuring to see them take a stand against some skeletons creeping in the geekdom cupboard. In case that’s not what you’re hearing, though, tell us more.
